items.name: Kalita Wave 185
items.note: For beginners, I found the Kalita Wave to be decently easy to learn with because of the slow drip rate.

items.name: Hario Mini Mill Slim
items.note: Took a little time to get used to, but I can now grind 20g of grounds in ~30 seconds.

items.name: Hario Drip Scale/Timer
items.note: Rad combination scale designed specifically for pourovers.

items.name: Bonavita Gooseneck Kettle
items.note: Adjustable temperature settings make this useful for both my tea and coffee.

items.name: Kalita Wave Filter 185
items.note: Kalita drippers have specific filters that you should buy!

items.name: Water Filter
items.note: If you don't already have one, definitely invest in a water filter of some sort. Water quality impacts the taste of your coffee.

items.name: Torch Coffee Measure House
items.note: This might be one of the most extra accessories I've purchased, but it's an absolute delight using this cute lil scoop!
